lead_paragraph: Williams earned her 18th straight victory against Sharapova, the fifth seed, to advance to a semifinal against another player she has dominated, Agnieszka Radwanska.

headline.print_headline: Williams Advances to Semifinal With 18th Straight Victory Over Sharapova
headline.main: Serena Williams Rolls Past Maria Sharapova at Australian Open

snippet: Williams earned her 18th straight victory against Sharapova, the fifth seed, to advance to a semifinal against another player she has dominated, Agnieszka Radwanska.
abstract: Serena Williams scores 18th consecutive win over Maria Sharapova in Australian Open quarterfinals.
